<% while (counter < end) { %> <% if ($.inArray(counter.weekday(), [5,6]) !== -1) { %>
<%= instance.renderSection(counter) %>
<% counter.add(1, 'days') %>
<%= instance.renderSection(counter) %>
<% } else { %> <% clss = 'calendar-col'; if (now.isSame(counter, 'day')) clss += ' calendar-col-today'; %> <% if ($.inArray(counter.weekday(), [3]) !== -1) { %>
<% } %>
<%= instance.renderSection(counter) %>
<% } %> <% counter.add(1, 'days') %> <% } %>
